Jan Dennison

Web Developer

Pokédecks Flashcard Game

Pokédecks Website GitHub Repo

Project Timespan: 3 days, April, 2015

Our team that built this project over a weekend as practice with complex modeling and associations in a database. We implemented a full Agile workflow with frequent standups and peer-pairing, task tracking and review, and a team retro. I implemented the UI as well as vertical slices for user CRUD and some game play.

Built with: Ruby, Rails, Active Record, CSS

This site is designed to be responsive, HTML5 validated, CSS validated, optimized for accessibility, with minimal JavaScript enhancements. It's also a github.io site with Jekyll blog integration.
